alert.note: Alert for Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 19 at 6:37AM MDT until May 19 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
